sugeng tigefa

Glyphicons Halflings are normally not available for free, but an arrangement between Bootstrap and the Glyphicons creators have made this possible at no cost to you as developers. As a thank you, we ask you to include an optional link back to Glyphicons whenever practical.

Fork me on Github == git@tigefa4u

gem install jekyll Visite full documentation Jekyllrb.com

git clone git@github.com:tigefa4u/tigefa4u.github.io.git

cd tigefa4u.github.io

jekyll build

jekyll serve

visite http://localhost:4000

Build with Jekyll and Bootstrap + Font-Awesome
